Produce Google token

If token is not already available, call gs_auth() to either load from cache or initiate OAuth2.0 flow. Return the token -- not "bare" but, rather, prepared for inclusion in downstream requests. Use the unexported function access_token()`` to reveal the actual access token, suitable for use withcurl`.

google_token(verbose = FALSE)

include_token_if(cond)

omit_token_if(cond)

Value

a httr::request-class object (an S3 class provided by httr)
